Decadriver.NAME: DecaDriver
Decadriver.FLAVOR: Henshin belt. It reads the two-dimensional data sealed within a Rider Card and uses an internal stone, Trickster, to manifest the armor parts and other materials in a three-dimensional form.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per battle，you may right click this Relic to gain KamenRide: Decade status. NL You may use #yFormCard to make 1 random card cost 0.

TOEIDeficitBill.NAME: TOEIDeficitBill
TOEIDeficitBill.FLAVOR: Financial strain, budget to Super Sentai first...
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click this relic to open the toggles for Henshin animations, attack animations, and BGM.
